details.top: The good deeds which endure are:
details.arabic_diacless: سبحان اللٰه، والحمد للٰه، ولا إلٰه إلا اللٰه، واللٰه أكبر، لا حول ولا قوة إلا باللٰه
details.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ، وَلَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللّٰهُ، وَاللّٰهُ أَكْبَرُ، لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللّٰهِ
details.transliteration: Subhaanallaah, Alhamdu lillaah, Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaah, wa Allaahu 'Akbar, Laa hawla wa laa quwwata 'illaa billaah.
details.translations: How perfect Allaah is, and all praise is for Allaah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allaah, and Allaah is the greatest. There is no might nor power except with Allaah.
details.reference: Ahmad (no. 513) (Ahmad Shakir, ed.) and its chain of narration is authentic. See Majma'uz-Zawa'id 1/297. Ibn Hajar mentions it in Bulughul-Maram saying that Ibn Hibban and Al-Hakim considered it authentic.
